rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with a Scandinavian minimalist design, featuring exposed wood beams and a neutral color palette. Incorporates Vastu principles by aligning the door to the east.
An open-concept living room with floor-to-ceiling windows on the south and west facades for ample natural light. Scandinavian design elements include clean lines and functional furniture.

A dedicated dining area adjacent to the living room with a modern Scandinavian aesthetic, featuring an extendable table and built-in seating. The layout adheres to Vastu principles by keeping this space away from the main entrance.
A state-of-the-art kitchen with an island counter and Scandinavian fixtures. Designed following local building norms and Vastu guidelines ensuring proper ventilation and light exposure.
Servant's quarters including a small bedroom and attached bathroom, designed with simplicity in mind. The layout respects local norms by providing easy access to the main living areas.
A spacious master bedroom featuring Scandinavian interior design with natural light from a large window facing east. Vastu principles dictate placing the bed in the southwest corner.
One of the three additional bedrooms designed for guests or family members, with Scandinavian minimalism and soft color schemes. Vastu principles ensure a balanced energy flow in the room.
Another bedroom maintaining the same design philosophy as above, ensuring privacy and comfort with Scandinavian decor elements and adherence to Vastu guidelines.

The third additional bedroom designed for optimum space utilization while incorporating Scandinavian design aesthetics and local building norms. Vastu principles ensure energy equilibrium in the room.

openings.description: Large entrance door oriented towards the east to invite positive energy as per Vastu guidelines.
Multiple large windows across living spaces for natural light and cross ventilation, in keeping with Scandinavian design aesthetics.
A private balcony adjoining the master bedroom for outdoor views and relaxation, designed to complement the Scandinavian style with modern railings.

garden.description: A large, irregular garden layout that seamlessly integrates with the cottage design. The garden features native plants, a small water feature aligned with Vastu principles (east side), and paved pathways for easy access.

plot.description: Irregular plot designed to maximize natural light and adhere to Vastu principles. The layout has been optimized to incorporate the penthouse design while respecting local building norms.
